pattern.title: Base type of complex type with complex content must have complex content

assert.test: some $derivation in xs:*[self::xs:extension or self::xs:restriction], $base-qname in resolve-QName($derivation/@base, $derivation), $base-type in nf:resolve-type($derivation, $base-qname) satisfies empty($base-type/self::xs:complexType/xs:simpleContent)

rule.assert: Rule 9-12: The base type of a complex type with complex content MUST have complex content.
